name: Police simulator lethal Force
description:
Long story short. PSLF is GTA reverse. Like lspdfr for gtav .

Imagine that situation, when you want to player another shorter about gang member, pressing play, so far looking good, but instead of became a gang member you become a police officer of NJPD.

Basically it's a fps with some police mehanics. Storyline will tell us a story of a regular police officer, but with a speaker who had to tell the story of a gang member, but nowt had to tell the story of a player who became a police officer due to a "mistake" of the developers. 

Sounds good? Awesome but game is still in early stage of development so join my discord server where actually a lot of my work not only this game. And get updated on development status https://discord.gg/cKbXAyXcWk

Before you click buy button you should know that I'm alone making this game, and currently free for suggestions of publishers. Also if you agree to work with me on this project for free., Contact me by email or discord

zelmerfox69@gmail.com

John D.#3775
